# Put it together

<font color="#55b748">**Step 1:**</font> Create a new directory called `asec-analysis`

<font color="#55b748">**Step 2:**</font> Create an RStudio project (`.Rproj`). Open the project.

<font color="#55b748">**Step 3:**</font> Create a data folder and add `cps-asec.csv`

<font color="#55b748">**Step 4:**</font> Install `library(urbntemplates)`

<font color="#55b748">**Step 5:**</font> Create a web report with `urbntemplates::construct_web_report()`

<font color="#55b748">**Step 6:**</font> Give the `.Rmd` file a meaningful name

<font color="#55b748">**Step 7:**</font> Load `cps-asec.csv` and create summary statistics and data visualizations. 

<font color="#55b748">**Step 8:**</font> Knit the R Markdown into an html document
